Name: Torto: Cursed Divine
About the game: Torto cursed divine is a 2D adventure with basic climbing mechanics that allow you to explore an island to find challenges and beat them in the order you prefer. Every area you visit has a temple full of puzzles and enemies that will unlock access to a Godâ€™s location awaiting for you to battle. More than a hundred secrets are hidden to expand your health and power for your adventure! An unexpected event takes you to Klux Island, a sacred place where the Gods reside alongside with the mortals. Normally a paradise, the island has transformed into a prison after the ships get stranded on the island with no possibility of leaving. You have to confront the Gods in order to leave and free the people from the place they thought was their home. You have a Whistle Sword, a weapon that brings the power of the divine to you, mere mortal. Meet other characters that like you are trapped on the island and discover the past that led to the Cursed Divine.
